albums.name: Joe's Garage
albums.description: Joe's Garage is a three-part rock opera released by American musician Frank Zappa in September and November 1979

albums.name: Abbey Road
albums.description: Abbey Road is the eleventh studio album by English rock band the Beatles, released on 26 September 1969

albums.name: Sticky Fingers
albums.description: Sticky Fingers is the ninth British and eleventh American studio album by the English rock band the Rolling Stones, released in April 1971

albums.name: Tommy
albums.description: Tommy is the fourth studio album by the English rock band The Who, a double album first released in May 1969

albums.name: Led Zeppelin IV
albums.description: Led Zeppelin IV is the fourth studio album by the English rock band Led Zeppelin, released on 8 November 1971

albums.name: The Dark Side of the Moon
albums.description: The Dark Side of the Moon is the eighth studio album by English rock band Pink Floyd, released on 1 March 1973

albums.name: Ace of Spades
albums.description: Ace of Spades is the fourth studio album by the band Motörhead, released on 8 November 1980

albums.name: The Wall
albums.description: The Wall is the eleventh studio album by the English rock band Pink Floyd, released on 30 November 1979

albums.name: Back in Black
albums.description: Back in Black is the seventh studio album by Australian rock band AC/DC, released on 25 July 1980

albums.name: Hotel California
albums.description: Hotel California is the fifth studio album by American rock band the Eagles, released on December 8, 1976

albums.name: Born to Run
albums.description: Born to Run is the third studio album by American singer-songwriter Bruce Springsteen, released on August 25, 1975

albums.name: Rumours
albums.description: Rumours is the eleventh studio album by British-American rock band Fleetwood Mac, released on February 4, 1977

albums.name: The Joshua Tree
albums.description: The Joshua Tree is the fifth studio album by Irish rock band U2, released on March 9, 1987

albums.name: Nevermind
albums.description: Nevermind is the second studio album by American rock band Nirvana, released on September 24, 1991

albums.name: Thriller
albums.description: Thriller is the sixth studio album by American singer Michael Jackson, released on November 30, 1982

albums.name: The Rise and Fall of Ziggy Stardust
albums.description: The Rise and Fall of Ziggy Stardust and the Spiders from Mars is the fifth studio album by English musician David Bowie, released on June 16, 1972

albums.name: Blood Sugar Sex Magik
albums.description: Blood Sugar Sex Magik is the fifth studio album by American rock band Red Hot Chili Peppers, released on September 24, 1991

albums.name: The Velvet Underground & Nico
albums.description: The Velvet Underground & Nico is the debut album by American rock band the Velvet Underground, released on March 12, 1967

albums.name: Bridge over Troubled Water
albums.description: Bridge over Troubled Water is the fifth and final studio album by American folk rock duo Simon & Garfunkel, released on January 26, 1970

albums.name: Electric Ladyland
albums.description: Electric Ladyland is the third and final studio album by the Jimi Hendrix Experience, released on October 16, 1968

albums.name: London Calling
albums.description: London Calling is the third studio album by English rock band the Clash, released on 14 December 1979

albums.name: The Queen Is Dead
albums.description: The Queen Is Dead is the third studio album by English rock band the Smiths, released on 16 June 1986

albums.name: Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band
albums.description: Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band is the eighth studio album by the English rock band the Beatles, released on 26 May 1967

albums.name: The Doors
albums.description: The Doors is the debut album by the American rock band the Doors, released on January 4, 1967

albums.name: Court and Spark
albums.description: Court and Spark is the sixth studio album by Canadian singer-songwriter Joni Mitchell, released on January 1, 1974

albums.name: Highway 61 Revisited
albums.description: Highway 61 Revisited is the sixth studio album by American singer-songwriter Bob Dylan, released on August 30, 1965

albums.name: Kind of Blue
albums.description: Kind of Blue is a studio album by American jazz trumpeter Miles Davis, released on August 17, 1959
